Enumeration Type Documentation

enum SERVICES_YADIS_MATCH_ALL

Require the XPath implementation. This match mode means a given service must match ALL filters passed to the Services_Yadis_XRDS::services() call.

Definition at line 25 of file XRDS.php.

enum SERVICES_YADIS_MATCH_ANY

This match mode means a given service must match ANY filters (at least one) passed to the Services_Yadis_XRDS::services() call.

Definition at line 31 of file XRDS.php.
